long_description: The tough and travel-ready BOB Motion Travel bag safeguards your BOB Motion stroller when you're on the go, be it via plane, train or automobile. Constructed out of heavy-duty fabric to withstand the rigors of travel. Folded Motion stroller conveniently fits in the bag without having to remove the wheels. Adjustable shoulder strap helps make the bag easy to carry; strap can be removed for airplane travel. The BOB Motion Travel bag is compatible with BOB Motion strollers (stroller sold separately).
short_description: The tough and travel-ready BOB Motion Travel bag safeguards your BOB Motion stroller when you're on the go, be it via plane, train or automobile.
